experience.title: Fullstack Project
info: It is a react app in which the user can give a quiz and gets the percentage of the questions that are correct
It has functionalities like we can select number of questions, we can skip the question
Also we can select the category of questions and its difficulty etc.

experience.title: MERN Stack Project
info: It includes features such as donor registration, blood requests, inventory management
The project aims to provide a seamless user experience and efficient blood inventory management for blood banks and donors.
It has functionalities like user authentication, and searching for donors

experience.title: MERN Stack Project
info: Project uses given JSON data to create a MongoDB database and create an API in node.js to retrieve the data.
The visualizations are created using chart.js library.
Project aims to generate insights from creative visualizations.
